item.title: Sergine add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Beauty without expression is boring." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Sergine add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Words mean more than what is set down on paper. It takes the human voice to infuse them with shades of deeper meaning." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Sergine add a quote by Anthony Storr
item.description: "[A]voidance behavior is a response designed to protect the infant from behavioural disorganization. If we transfer this concept to adult life, we can see that an avoidant infant might very well develop into a person whose principal need was to find some kind of meaning and order in life which was not entirely, or even chiefly, dependent upon interpersonal relationships." -- Anthony Storr

item.title: Sergine add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Sergine add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "It's not what enters men's mouth that is evil," said the alchemist. It's what comes out of their mouths that is." -- Paulo Coelho
